PropertyBag.Description: Represents a class for configuring notifications that use OAuth standard for authentication at the notification endpoint.
PropertyBag.Name: OAuthWebServerConsumerConfiguration

Property.Description: Represents an authorization URI of the end-user at the Authorization Server.
Property.Name: AccessAuthorizationUri

Property.Description: The value must be set to "code" for the Web server authentication flow.
Property.Name: ResponseType

Property.Description: Consumer key from the remote access application definition.
Property.Name: ClientId

Property.Description: The scope parameter enables you to fine-tune what the client application can access at the authorization server. The value of the scope parameter is expressed as a list of space-delimited, case sensitive strings. The strings are defined by the authorization server.
Property.Name: Scope

Property.Description: A consumer can use the refresh token to get a new session as needed. This parameter represents an URI of the token endpoint.
Property.Name: AccessTokenUri

Property.Description: Consumer secret from the remote access application definition. This parameter is optional.
Property.Name: ClientSecret

Property.Description: Refresh tokens are credentials used to obtain access tokens. Refresh tokens are issued to the client by the authorization server and are used to obtain a new access token when the current access token becomes invalid or expires, or to obtain additional access tokens with identical or narrower scope. A refresh token is a string representing the authorization granted to the client by the resource owner.
Property.Name: RefreshToken

Property.Description: A date of the error returned from the authorization server.
Property.Name: LastAuthorizationErrorDate

Property.Description: Represents an error code returned from the authorization server.
Property.Name: LastAuthorizationErrorCode

Property.Description: Represents description of the error with additional information returned from the authorization server.
Property.Name: LastAuthorizationErrorDescription

Property.Description: This property is to define how Metanga is actually going to use the access token in the notifications. You can use "Oauth" value to populate this property.
Property.Name: AccessTokenType
